BT.modules.export

Class ExportModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.modules.export.ExportModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExportToEps, ExportToPdf, ExportToXml

    public class ExportModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for setting basic model for exports.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Field Detail

      • exportedPlaces

        protected DiagramPlacesManager exportedPlaces
        Places that are being exported. It contains each place from useCase diagram, class diagram and from every OOPN of this file each object.

      • exportToFolder

        protected java.io.File exportToFolder
        File location of File that needs to be exported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExportModel

        public ExportModel(DiagramPlacesManager exportedPlaces,
           java.io.File exportToFolder)
        Basic constructor. It sets exportedPlaces and exportToFolder.
        Parameters:
        exportedPlaces - each place from useCase diagram, class diagram and from every OOPN of this file each object
        exportToFolder - file location of folder.

    • Method Detail

      • getExportedPlaces

        public DiagramPlacesManager getExportedPlaces()
        Get places that are exported.
        Returns:
        DiagramPlacesManager with everz object of each part of appliacation.

      • getExportToFolder

        public java.io.File getExportToFolder()
        Get path of file that is being exported.
        Returns:
        File, complete path.

      • createNewFile

        public java.io.File createNewFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                         java.lang.String extension)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Method for creating new file. If file allready exists, it will create file with number at end.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of newly created file.
        extension - what extensin should be used.
        Returns:
        File, whole path to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when error occures.
